When he takes a long term assignment overseas, Donna feels abandoned and turns to her daughterâ€™s schoolteacher for companionship. She is unaware that he is a dangerous murderer and thief who preys on lonely married women. When her husband returns she is forced to deal with her betrayal and bring him to justice. Deadly Betrayal
